item.title: Compile NFS
item.description: Compile Contrib The original instructions from NFS say that we need to download and compile the following packages. metis-5.1.0.tar.gz hdf5-1.8.19.tar.gz CGNS-3.3.0.tar.gz mpich-3.2.tar.gz Here we compile only 3 of them, excluding mpich. Supercomputers like Tianhe-2 have their customized MPI environments. Using our own MPI will degrade the running speed. File Structure . ├── contrib │ ├── cgns │ ├── hdf5 │ └── metis ├── contrib_src │ ├── cgns_src │ ├── hdf5_src │ └── metis_src └── NFS ├── cmake ├── contrib ├── debug ├── dev_utility └── src Before compiling the contrib packages, set the root dir.
